original_text: So, Christian friends, think carefully about who Jesus is. Like us, God has chosen you to belong to him. We tell people that we believe in Jesus as the messenger that God has sent. He helps us as God's most important priest.
korean_text: 그러므로 함께 하늘의 부르심을 받은 거룩한 형제들아 우리가 믿는 도리의 사도이시며 대제사장이신 예수를 깊이 생각하라

sentences.original_text: So, Christian friends, think carefully about who Jesus is.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 그리스도인 친구들이여, 예수님께서 누구신지 신중히 생각하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Like us, God has chosen you to belong to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리처럼, 하나님께서는 당신이 그의 것으로 속하도록 선택하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: We tell people that we believe in Jesus
as the messenger that God has sent.
